<available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.snc.apps_creator" name="Application Creator" state="published" version="1.0.0" provider_name="ServiceNow" licensable="true" invalidate_properties="true"> <description>Application Creator</description> <requires> <import plugin="com.glide.ui.angular" /> <import plugin="com.glide.ui.heisenberg" /> </requires> <extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="ng_ac_sm" class="com.snc.apps.creator.sm.NGSmProcessor"/> <extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="ng_ac_service" class="com.snc.apps.creator.service.NGServiceProcessor"/> <extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="ng_ac_app" class="com.snc.apps.creator.NGAppProcessor"/> <extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="ng_ac_sm_validator" class="com.snc.apps.creator.sm.NGSmValidator"/> <extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="ng_progress" class="com.glide.worker.NGProgressProcessor"/> <extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="ng_ac_basic" class="com.snc.apps.creator.basic.NGBasicProcessor"/> </plugin>]]></definition> <description>Application Creator</description>
